DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized controlled study evaluating the impact of 2 months of oral appliance therapy on endothelial function in patients with severe obstructive sleep apnea syndrome intolerant to continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) therapy.
DOC.brief_title: VASO-AM :Impact of Oral Appliance Therapy on Endothelial Function in Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: AHI > 30 Intolerance to CPAP therapy Signed informed consent Epworth sleepiness scale > 16/24 Severe cardiac and/or respiratory disease BMI>32 kg/m2 Dental contraindication to oral appliance
